article.title: What is the next innovation after the internet of things?

multiple_choice_question.text: What key characteristic distinguishes the Tactile Internet from previous generations of the internet, as illustrated in Figure 1?
choices: Interconnection of billions of smart devices
Ultra-fast reaction times and carrier-grade reliability
Optimized for static or streaming content

multiple_choice_question.text: According to Figure 2, what is the maximum total latency objective for a data life cycle in the Tactile Internet?
Figure 3 illustrates a typical architecture for the Tactile Internet\'s infrastructure. What is the primary purpose of utilizing a multi-stage hierarchy of cloud platforms in this context?
choices: To ensure high data storage capacity.
To keep tactile applications local and close to users.
To facilitate global data sharing between researchers.

multiple_choice_question.text: The article emphasizes the importance of achieving ultra-low end-to-end latency, ideally 1ms, for the Tactile Internet.  What fundamental physical limitation poses a significant challenge in achieving this goal?
choices: Bandwidth limitations of fiber optic cables.
Data storage capacity of cloud servers.
